description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
Government of Canada Department of National Defence Solicitation

**Solicitation Number:**
W8482-242208/A

**Public Notice Date:** February 13, 2024
**Closing Date:** March 8, 2024 at 14:00

**Tender for Items 1 and 2**

The Department of National Defence invites bids for the procurement of:

* 60 Test Kits, Oil Condition with the following detail:
	+ Part No.: FG-K2-404-KW
	+ NCAGE: U9579
	+ KITTIWAKE DEVELOPMENTS LIMITED

Delivery is requested at:

* CFB Halifax Hazmat, Nova Scotia
* CFB Esquimalt Hazmat, British Columbia

**Tender Requirements:**

* Bidder must provide an equivalent or substitute product with brand name and model, part number, and NCAGE.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Selection Criteria:**
The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services. The lowest price will be selected as the winner of the tender.

**Attachments:**

* English RFP Clauses (.pdf)
* French RFP Clauses (.pdf)
* Amendment 001 (.pdf)

**Contact Information:**

* Anthony Lemoine-Hoefsmit
* Phone: (819) 939-3725
* Email: (Anthony.Lemoine-Hoefsmit@forces.gc.ca)
* Canadian Government Buys: Canadabuys.canada.ca for tender notice, attachments, etc.

Dataset corresponds to the following notice/information categories relevant to the Government of Canada, Public Works and Government Services: 

* Canada Shopping 
* Contracts, Grants and Contributions 
* Procurement Glossary 
* Parliamentary 
* Tenders 
* Treasury Board 
* Subject: Getsystems platform for public works goverment
```
